response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. Considering the product's worth to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for it. This offer takes into account both the value you place on the product and my objective to maximize the return on this valuable asset. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a satisfactory arrangement.", "product_price": 12000}
